content:
Hi all, I am interested in formalizing the following paper : https://arxiv.org/pdf/2209.10826.pdf
which gives conditions for faithfulness of the Burau representation for n=4. Is anybody working on the same? Also, are there others who might also be interested in this? It might require some knowledge of braids and graphs.
Thank you!

I'm not aware of any active work: all I can find is my suggestion that someone define the Burau representation!

I think generally this stuff should be formalizable without major difficulty, but there is a lot to be done.

Diagrammatic stuff (knots, tangles, Alexander's theorem, Markov theorem) is potentially much harder.
Thank you! I do want to get to knots, I thought this might be a potential way of doing it.
